name: LOC Documentation
description: FST Network's user documentation for Logic Operating Centre (LOC) built on React-based Docusaurus 3.
footnote: I'm the creator and currently the sole maintainer. The repo is private from general viewers. The site in the link is actually a preserved version deployed on Vercel. For the official deployed version, visit here.

name: Svelte/Golang Full-Stack Demo App
description: A monolithic full-stack shopping app with its own database inspired by the book Essential TypeScript.

name: Online TypeScript Editor
description: A demo online editor with IntelliSense support that can execute code directly in browser.

name: MicroPython Driver for TEA5767 FM Radio Module
description: A radio driver that works much better than existing Arduino drivers utilizing features documented in the data sheet. A CircuitPython version is also available.

name: SEFR Multiclass Classifier
description: The first multi-class classifier implementation based on SEFR, a fast linear-time binary classifier designed for model training on low-powered microcontrollers.

name: MakeCode Editor Extension for Nexus:bit and NexusBot
description: A MakeCode editor extension (written in TypeScript) for operating the micro:bit expansion board, Nexus:bit (a KittenBot Robot:bit clone) and Nexusbot (an OTTO robot-clone). Supports three languages.
footnote: My former boss changed the author name to his after I left, however you can still find my name in the source code (including the original repo he forked).
